general.name: Khan Academy
general.value: [Open education platform in a dizzying array of subjects](https://www.khanacademy.org/)

math.name: Wolfram Alpha
math.value: [General-purpose calculator for all kinds of math and science: use =pup to run queries inside the server!](https://www.wolframalpha.com/)

writing.name: Purdue OWL
writing.value: [Fabulous, very comprehensive source for all kinds of writing](https://owl.purdue.edu/owl/teacher_and_tutor_resources/writing_instructors/non_purdue_users.html)

writing.name: Grammarly
writing.value: [Free spelling and grammar check: not perfect but will catch some things](https://www.grammarly.com/grammar-check)

writing.name: Zotero
writing.value: [Program and browser extension that lets you easily manage citations](https://www.zotero.org/)
